verses.roman:
nīlāmbara cakravartī kahila gaṇiyā
ei māse putra habe śubha-kṣaṇa pāñā

synonyms: nīlāmbara cakravartī—of the name Nīlāmbara Cakravartī; kahila—said; gaṇiyā—by astrological calculation; ei māse—in this month; putra—son; habe—will take birth; śubha-kṣaṇa—auspicious moment; pāñā—taking advantage of.
translation: Nīlāmbara Cakravartī [the grandfather of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu] then did an astrological calculation and said that in that month, taking advantage of an auspicious moment, the child would take birth.
